tvShow.title: Naruto ShippÅ«den
tvShow.sinopsis: Naruto Shippuuden is the continuation of the original animated TV series Naruto.The story revolves around an older and slightly more matured Uzumaki Naruto and his quest to save his friend Uchiha Sasuke from the grips of the snake-like Shinobi, Orochimaru. After 2 and a half years Naruto finally returns to his village of Konoha, and sets about putting his ambitions to work, though it will not be easy, as He has amassed a few (more dangerous) enemies, in the likes of the shinobi organization; Akatsuki.

tvShow.title: Chernobyl
tvShow.sinopsis: In April 1986, an explosion at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant in the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics becomes one of the world's worst man-made catastrophes.

tvShow.title: Breaking Bad
tvShow.sinopsis: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.

tvShow.title: Sherlock
tvShow.sinopsis: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

tvShow.title: Death Note
tvShow.sinopsis: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

tvShow.title: Hunter x Hunter
tvShow.sinopsis: Gon Freecss aspires to become a Hunter, an exceptional being capable of greatness. With his friends and his potential, he seeks for his father who left him when he was younger.

tvShow.title: Designated Survivor
tvShow.sinopsis: A low-level Cabinet member becomes President of the United States after a catastrophic attack kills everyone above him in the line of succession.

tvShow.title: Friends
tvShow.sinopsis: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.

tvShow.title: Narcos
tvShow.sinopsis: A chronicled look at the criminal exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar, as well as the many other drug kingpins who plagued the country through the years.

tvShow.title: One Piece
tvShow.sinopsis: Follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew in order to find the greatest treasure ever left by the legendary Pirate, Gold Roger. The famous mystery treasure named "One Piece".
